com.rift.coad.lib.deployment.bean
Class BeanLoader

java.lang.Object

          com.rift.coad.lib.deployment.bean.BeanLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class BeanLoader
extends BasicThread

This class is responsible for loading the coadunation beans in to memory from the jar file.
